UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Represents a user account within the CapstoneTrack system, differentiating user roles.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

email.description: Email address of the user account.

status.description: The status of the user account.

studentId.description: Reference to Student entity, if the user is a student. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 Student)

supervisorId.description: Reference to Supervisor entity, if the user is a supervisor. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 Supervisor)

Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student within the CapstoneTrack system.

className.description: The class name of the student (e.g., '22SE111').

phone.description: The phone number of the student.

CCCD.description: The citizen identification card number of the student.

status.description: The academic status of the student.

Supervisor.title: Supervisor
Supervisor.description: Represents a supervisor within the CapstoneTrack system.

facultyRank.description: The faculty rank of the supervisor.

GraduationDefenseSession.title: GraduationDefenseSession
GraduationDefenseSession.description: Represents a period for organizing graduation project defenses.

id.description: Unique identifier for the defense session.

name.description: Name of the defense session (e.g., 'Spring 2024 Defense').

startDate.description: The start date of the session.

expectedReportDate.description: The expected date for the final defense reports.

registrationDeadline.description: The deadline for students to register for this defense session.

description.description: A brief description of the session.

zaloGroupLink.description: URL link to the Zalo group for this session.

status.description: The current status of the defense session.

DefenseSessionRegistration.title: DefenseSessionRegistration
DefenseSessionRegistration.description: Represents a student's registration for a specific defense session.

sessionId.description: Reference to the GraduationDefenseSession this registration belongs to.

studentId.description: Reference to the registered student's document ID.

studentName.description: Full name of the student for display purposes.

registrationDate.description: Timestamp when the registration was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user account information including their role.

/graduationDefenseSessions/{sessionId}.description: Stores information about graduation defense sessions.

/defenseRegistrations/{registrationId}.description: Stores student registrations for all defense sessions.
